p: HMPV infection may be more severe in patients with underlying medical conditions. It has been shown that 30â€“85% of children hospitalized with HMPV have chronic conditions such as asthma, chronic lung disease due to prematurity or congenital heart disease. In addition, HMPV is an important cause of acute respiratory disease in older adults (>65 years) and adults with comorbid diseases such as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, asthma, immunosuppression and chronic renal failure. Much of the comorbidity was based on positive HMPV, mainly in people over 40 years of age [ 18]
